actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to remove the restriction on the employment in certain occupations of individuals below the age of 18 who are high school graduates and who have received appropriate vocational education in such occupations.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from restrictions on "oppressive child labor" the employment in any occupation of any person who is a graduate of a secondary school and who has received appropriate (as determined by the Secretary of Labor) vocational education in such occupation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to remove the restriction on the employment in certain occupations of individuals below the age of 18 who are high school graduates and who have received appropriate vocational education in such occupations.
